metadata.Title: CVE-2010-3389 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The (1) SAPDatabase and (2) SAPInstance scripts in OCF Resource Agents (aka resource-agents or cluster-agents) 1.0.3 in Linux-HA place a zero-length directory name in the LD_LIBRARY_PATH, which allows local users to gain privileges via a Trojan horse shared library in the current working directory.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-3389` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cluster-agents - 1:1.0.4-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cluster-agents package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.0.4-0ubuntu1').
